text: Viva Technology, also called VivaTech is a yearly conference for technology held every January at the Paris Expo Porte de Versailles, Paris, France. It hosts Technology companies to review and announce their new products.Viva Technology 2017 : le salon en 10 questions It is open to the public the last day.Viva Technology revient fêter l’innovation à Paris In 2023, the conference attracted more visitors than the CES of Las Vegas.Viva Tech 2023 détrône le CES de Las Vegas ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Technology Category:Paris Category:2016 establishments in France
title: Viva Technology
